title: Implement Policy Cancel Output and Fallback Trigger
description: Extend the Lane C ControlEngine and LaneArbitrator to support policy cancel events that immediately stop Lane B audio and trigger fallback handling. Ensure the fallback planner is invoked and the correct arbitration state transitions occur.
acceptance_criteria: Policy cancel event from Lane C stops Lane B audio playback
FallbackPlanner is invoked when cancel_output is triggered
Session resumes listening after fallback completes
